verbose_text: It seems that most primate lentiviruses prevent this by Nef mediated downmodulation of the TCR-CD3 receptor from the cell surface, whereas HIV-1 and its vpu containing simian precursors utilize Vpu to prevent NF-kappaB activation at a later step of the signaling pathway.
evidence: vpu-containing simian precursors utilize Vpu to prevent NF-kappaB
